罷り: (まかり) - emphatic verbal prefix; humble verbal prefix
罷りならぬ: (まかりならぬ) - not be allowed; must not
罷り出る: (まかりでる) - to leave; to withdraw; to appear before
罷り成らぬ: (まかりならぬ) - not be allowed; must not
罷り越す: (まかりこす) - to visit; to call on
罷り通る: (まかりとおる) - to go by; to let pass; to get away with; to let slide; to overlook
罷り間違う: (まかりまちがう) - to go wrong; to turn for the worse
罷り間違えば: (まかりまちがえば) - if things go wrong; if the worst happens
罷免: (himen) - dismissal (a partir de uma posição), discharge
罷免権: (ひめんけん) - authority to dismiss someone (from a position)
罹患率: (りかんりつ) - disease rate; infection rate; morbidity rate
罹病: (りびょう) - contraction of a disease; morbidity
罹病率: (りびょうりつ) - disease rate; infection rate; morbidity rate

羅漢: (らかん) - arhat; Lohan; achiever of Nirvana
羅漢回し: (らかんまわし) - game in which people sit in a circle taking turns to imitate the previous person's humorous facial expression or gesture
羅漢果: (ラカンカ) - luo han guo (Siraitia grosvenorii); herbaceous perennial vine native to China and Thailand; fruit of the Siraita grosvenorii
羅漢柏: (アスナロ) - hiba false arborvitae (species of cypress, Thujopsis dolabrata)
羅漢槙: (ラカンマキ) - Podocarpus macrophyllus var. maki (variety of yew plum pine)
羅萄日辞典: (らぽにちじてん) - Dictionarium Latino Lusitanicum, ac Iaponicum, (Latin- Portuguese-Japanese dictionary, pub. 1595)
羅葡日辞典: (らぽにちじてん) - Dictionarium Latino Lusitanicum, ac Iaponicum, (Latin- Portuguese-Japanese dictionary, pub. 1595)

羅針盤座: (らしんばんざ) - Pyxis (constellation); the Compass Box

羊偏: (ひつじへん) - kanji "sheep" radical at left
